We have over 20 years of experience in providing high-quality roofing services for residential and commercial clients.
Communication is key to a successful project. That’s why we make sure to keep our clients informed and involved throughout the process.
We source our materials from reputable and trusted suppliers, and we ensure that they meet the highest standards of quality.
We have a valid license from the local authorities, and we comply with all the codes and regulations that apply to roofing services.
Ensuring Dry and Comfortable living spaces for over a decade

iconListComplete.iconListItemText: Major repair of up to 50 shingles

widgetText.widgetTextContent: I hired Roofix to replace my old and damaged roof, and I’m very happy with the result. They were very professional, courteous, and efficient. They did a great job installing the new roof, and they cleaned up everything after they were done.
